params.minPyOut: Minimum amount of PT/YT to receive
params.receiver: The address to receive the PT and YT

params.netPyIn: The amount of PT to redeem
params.receiver: The address to receive the tokens

params.exactYtIn: The exact amount of YT to swap
params.receiver: The address to receive the tokens

mintPyFromToken(address,address,uint256,.notice: Mints PT and YT from token

redeemPyToToken(address,address,uint256,.notice: Redeems PT to token after maturity
